scripts.dev: concurrently -n API,UI -c blue,green "nodemon --watch core --ext py --exec \"bash -lc 'if [ -n \\\"$WORKFLOW_FILE\\\" ]; then .venv/bin/python core/holon/devserver.py --file \\\"$WORKFLOW_FILE\\\" --port 8787; else .venv/bin/python core/holon/devserver.py --port 8787; fi'\"" "cd ui && npm run dev -- --host 127.0.0.1 --port 5173"
scripts.dev:api-watch: nodemon --watch core --ext py --exec "bash -lc 'if [ -n \\\"$WORKFLOW_FILE\\\" ]; then .venv/bin/python core/holon/devserver.py --file \\\"$WORKFLOW_FILE\\\" --port 8787; else .venv/bin/python core/holon/devserver.py --port 8787; fi'"
